mapper.select:
SELECT antNo,antId,antName,antNameKr,antNameCn,antAuthor,antIndexWord,antMuseumName1, antMuseumName2,antMuseumName3,antImgUri,antImgThumUriS,antImgThumUriM,antImgThumUriL, antNationalityName1,antNationalityName2,antMaterialName1,antMaterialName2,antPurposeName1, antPurposeName2,antPurposeName3,antPurposeName4,antSizeRangeName,antPlaceLandName1,antPlaceLandName2, antDesignationName1,antDesignationCode1,antSizeInfo,antDesc FROM ANTIQUITY WHERE 1=1
AND antNationalityName1 LIKE '%${antNationalityName1}%'
AND antNationalityName2 LIKE '%${antNationalityName2}%'
AND antPlaceLandName1 LIKE '%${antPlaceLandName1}%'
AND antPlaceLandName2 LIKE '%${antPlaceLandName2}%'
AND antMaterialName1 LIKE '%${antMaterialName1}%'
AND antMaterialName2 LIKE '%${antMaterialName2}%'
ORDER BY antNo DESC LIMIT ${limit} OFFSET ${offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ANTIQUITY WHERE 1=1
AND antNationalityName1 LIKE '%${antNationalityName1}%'
AND antNationalityName2 LIKE '%${antNationalityName2}%'
AND antPlaceLandName1 LIKE '%${antPlaceLandName1}%'
AND antPlaceLandName2 LIKE '%${antPlaceLandName2}%'
AND antMaterialName1 LIKE '%${antMaterialName1}%'
AND antMaterialName2 LIKE '%${antMaterialName2}%'

SELECT a.antNo,a.antId,a.antName,a.antNameKr,a.antNameCn,a.antAuthor,a.antIndexWord,a.antMuseumName1, a.antMuseumName2,a.antMuseumName3,a.antImgUri,a.antImgThumUriS,a.antImgThumUriM,a.antImgThumUriL, a.antNationalityName1,a.antNationalityName2,a.antMaterialName1,a.antMaterialName2,a.antPurposeName1, a.antPurposeName2,a.antPurposeName3,a.antPurposeName4,a.antSizeRangeName,a.antPlaceLandName1,a.antPlaceLandName2, a.antDesignationName1,a.antDesignationCode1,a.antSizeInfo,a.antDesc, r.aReplyNo as R_aReplyNo, r.memberNo as R_memberNo, r.content as R_content, r.good as R_good, r.bad as R_bad, r.STATUS as R_STATUS, r.createDate as R_createDate, r.modifyDate as R_modifyDate, M2.id as R_id FROM ANTIQUITY A LEFT OUTER JOIN A_REPLY R ON (A.antNo = R.antNo) LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M2 ON (R.memberNo = M2.memberNo) WHERE A.antNo = #{antNo}

SELECT r.aReplyNo, r.memberNo, r.content, r.good, r.bad, r.STATUS, r.createDate, r.modifyDate, M2.id FROM ANTIQUITY A LEFT OUTER JOIN A_REPLY R ON (A.antNo = R.antNo) LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M2 ON (R.memberNo = M2.memberNo) LEFT OUTER JOIN bookmark_ant b ON (b.antNo = A.antNo) WHERE A.antNo = #{antNo} and r.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT b.bookmarkAntNo FROM ANTIQUITY A LEFT OUTER JOIN A_REPLY R ON (A.antNo = R.antNo) LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M2 ON (R.memberNo = M2.memberNo) LEFT OUTER JOIN bookmark_ant b ON (b.antNo = A.antNo) WHERE A.antNo = #{antNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ANTIQUITY( antNo, antName, antNameKr, antNameCn, antAuthor, antIndexWord, antMuseumName1, antMuseumName2, antMuseumName3, antImgUri, antImgThumUriS, antImgThumUriM, antImgThumUriL, antNationalityName1, antNationalityName2, antMaterialName1, antMaterialName2, antPurposeName1, antPurposeName2, antPurposeName3, antPurposeName4, antSizeRangeName, antPlaceLandName1, antPlaceLandName2, antDesignationName1, antDesignationCode1, antSizeInfo, antDesc ) VALUES ( 0, #{antName}, #{antNameKr}, #{antNameCn}, #{antAuthor}, #{antIndexWord}, #{antMuseumName1}, #{antMuseumName2}, #{antMuseumName3}, #{antImgUri}, #{antImgThumUriS}, #{antImgThumUriM}, #{antImgThumUriL}, #{antNationalityName1}, #{antNationalityName2}, #{antMaterialName1}, #{antMaterialName2}, #{antPurposeName1}, #{antPurposeName2}, #{antPurposeName3}, #{antPurposeName4}, #{antSizeRangeName}, #{antPlaceLandName1}, #{antPlaceLandName2}, #{antDesignationName1}, #{antDesignationCode1}, #{antSizeInfo}, #{antDesc} )
INSERT INTO A_REPLY( aReplyNo, antNo, memberNo, content, good, bad, STATUS, createDate, modifyDate) VALUES( 0, #{antNo}, #{memberNo}, #{content}, #{good}, #{bad}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET antId = #{antId}, antName = #{antName}, antNameKr = #{antNameKr}, antNameCn = #{antNameCn}, antAuthor = #{antAuthor}, antIndexWord = #{antIndexWord}, antMuseumName1 = #{antMuseumName1}, antMuseumName2 = #{antMuseumName2}, antMuseumName3 = #{antMuseumName3}, antImgUri = #{antImgUri}, antImgThumUriS = #{antImgThumUriS}, antImgThumUriM = #{antImgThumUriM}, antImgThumUriL = #{antImgThumUriL}, antNationalityName1 = #{antNationalityName1}, antNationalityName2 = #{antNationalityName2}, antMaterialName1 = #{antMaterialName1}, antMaterialName2 = #{antMaterialName2}, antPurposeName1 = #{antPurposeName1}, antPurposeName2 = #{antPurposeName2}, antPurposeName3 = #{antPurposeName3}, antPurposeName4 = #{antPurposeName4}, antSizeRangeName = #{antSizeRangeName}, antPlaceLandName1 = #{antPlaceLandName1}, antPlaceLandName2 = #{antPlaceLandName2}, antDesignationName1 = #{antDesignationName1}, antDesignationCode1 = #{antDesignationCode1}, antSizeInfo = #{antSizeInfo}, antDesc = #{antDesc} WHERE NO=#{no}
UPDATE A_REPLY SET content=#{content}, modifyDate=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE aReplyNo=#{aReplyNo}
UPDATE A_REPLY SET good=#{good} WHERE aReplyNo=#{aReplyNo}
UPDATE A_REPLY SET bad=#{bad} WHERE aReplyNo=#{aReplyNo}
UPDATE A_REPLY SET STATUS='N' WHERE aReplyNo=#{aReplyNo}
